api-host.description: OpenAPI `host` must be present and non-empty string.

api-schemes.description: OpenAPI host `schemes` must be present and non-empty array.

host-not-example.description: Server URL should not point at `example.com`.

host-trailing-slash.description: Server URL should not have a trailing slash.

model-description.description: Model `description` must be present and non-empty string.

oas2-operation-security-defined.description: Operation `security` values must match a scheme defined in the `securityDefinitions` object.

valid-example-in-parameters.description: Examples must be valid against their defined schema.

valid-example-in-definitions.description: Examples must be valid against their defined schema.

oas2-anyOf.description: OpenAPI v3 keyword `anyOf` detected in OpenAPI v2 document.
oas2-anyOf.message: anyOf is not available in OpenAPI v2, it was added in OpenAPI v3

oas2-oneOf.description: OpenAPI v3 keyword `oneOf` detected in OpenAPI v2 document.
oas2-oneOf.message: oneOf is not available in OpenAPI v2, it was added in OpenAPI v3

oas2-schema.description: Validate structure of OpenAPI v2 specification.

schema.title: A JSON Schema for Swagger 2.0 API.

^x-.description: Any property starting with x- is valid.

swagger.description: The Swagger version of this document.

^x-.description: Any property starting with x- is valid.

title.description: A unique and precise title of the API.

version.description: A semantic version number of the API.

description.description: A longer description of the API. Should be different from the title.  GitHub Flavored Markdown is allowed.

termsOfService.description: The terms of service for the API.

contact.description: Contact information for the owners of the API.

name.description: The identifying name of the contact person/organization.

url.description: The URL pointing to the contact information.

email.description: The email address of the contact person/organization.

operation-parameters.description: Operation parameters are unique and non-repeating.

operation-summary-formatted.description: Operation `summary` should start with upper case and end with a dot.

path-declarations-must-exist.description: Path parameter declarations cannot be empty, ex.`/given/{}` is invalid.

path-keys-no-trailing-slash.description: paths should not end with a slash.

path-not-include-query.description: given keys should not include a query string.
